The `evidenceguide` package streamlines end-to-end PDF processing against the
Evidence Guide API.

## Installation

```r
# install.packages("evidenceguide")
```

## Basic workflow

```r
library(evidenceguide)

eg_set_api_key("ck_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX")

pdfs <- eg_select_files()
jobs <- eg_upload(pdfs)
results <- eg_wait(jobs$job_id)
raw <- purrr::set_names(results$result, results$job_id)
studies <- as_studies_df(raw)
```

Use `eg_process()` for a one-call pipeline that combines file selection,
upload, polling, and tidying.
